name: Smart watch
description: A smartwatch is a wearable device that combines the functionality of a traditional watch with advanced features like fitness tracking, notifications, heart rate monitoring, GPS, and app integration.

name: Analog watch
description: An analog watch is a timepiece that displays the time through a traditional clock face with hour, minute, and sometimes second hands. The watch typically has a round or rectangular face, with numbers or markers indicating the hours.

name: Batman toy
description: Batman action figure, meticulously designed to capture the iconic superhero's look with his signature black suit, cape, and utility belt

name: Ambrance watch
description: The Ambrance Watch is a sleek, minimalist timepiece designed with elegance and simplicity in mind.

name: Mens wear
description: levate your style with this classic men's red full-sleeve shirt, designed for a perfect fit and comfort. Made from high-quality, breathable fabric, it features a button-down front, crisp collar, and a tailored silhouette.

name: Sofa
description: A sofa is a comfortable seating furniture piece typically designed for multiple people. It's often upholstered with fabric, leather, or synthetic materials and comes in various sizes, styles, and colors.

name: Smart phone
description: The iPhone 13 is a sleek and compact smartphone featuring a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. It has a dual-camera system with 12MP wide and ultra-wide lenses, powered by the A15 Bionic chip for fast performance.
